metadata.title: CVE-2024-45615 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenSC, OpenSC tools, PKCS#11 module,minidriver, and CTK.The problem is missing  initialization of variables expected to beinitialized (as arguments to other functions, etc.).

criterions.comment: opensc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
